text: The men's 20 kilometres walk competition of the athletics events at the 1979 Pan American Games took place at the Estadio Sixto Escobar.Full results The defending Pan American Games champion was Daniel Bautista of Mexico. ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing world and Pan American Games records were as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- |World record | |1:21:01 |Raisio, Finland |June 6, 1979 |- |Pan American Games record | |1:33:05 |Winnipeg, Canada |1967 |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%;position:relative;" width=68% |- |KEY: |align=center|WR||World Record |align=center|GR||Pan American Record |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Rank !Name !Nation !Time !Notes |- | |Daniel Bautista | |1:28:15 |GR |- | |Neal Pyke | |1:30:17 | |- | |Clark Scully | |1:32:30 | |- | |Santiago Fonseca | |1:35:20 | |- | |Marcel Jobin | |1:38:42 | |- | |Domingo Colín | |1:40:02 | |- | |Ernesto Alfaro | |1:41:30 | |- | |Alexis López | |1:41:33 | |- | |Luis Mendez | |1:43:43 | |- |10 |Helmut Bueck | |1:44:55 | |- |11 |Wilmer Santiago | |1:47:58 | |- |12 |Jorge Quiñonez | |1:50:43 | |- |13 |Lino Medina | |1:54:48 | |- | |Glen Sweazey | | | |- | |Edgar López | | | |- | |Reinaldo Luces | | | |} ==References== Category:Athletics at the 1979 Pan American Games
